titleStmt.title: An answer to the representer's reflections upon the state and view of the controversy with a reply to the vindicator's full answer, shewing, that the vindicator has utterly ruined the new design of expounding and representing popery.
titleStmt.author: Clagett, William, 1646-1688.
Clagett, Nicholas, 1654-1727.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to William Clagett; identified by some sources as being written by Nicolas Clagett. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
